Headline: #95 95th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near Burley/91st
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police department activity at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police department activity at Racine.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
